#labels Phase-Design
Generate a preview image for a FLV video file, using ffmpeg.

= Example =

$ ffmpeg -y -i input.flv -f image2 -ss 60 -vframes 1 -s 120x90 -an 60.jpg

= Options =

  * *-i* _filename_
    input file name
  * *-f* _fmt_
    force format
  * *-ss* _time_
    timestamp in seconds
  * *-vframes* _number_
    frame number in the very second
  * *-s* _widthxheight_
  * *-an* _filename_
    output file name
